question: Who is the author of the book "Hema Malini: Beyond the Dream Girl"?
explanation: The book \"Hema Malini: Beyond the Dream Girl\" has been penned by author-columnist Ram Kamal Mukherjee. It\'s about actress achievement as a politician apart from her sojourn as an actor, danseuse and filmmaker. It will offer a new perspective on Bollywood\'s first female superstar.
